metadata.title: CVE-2020-9991 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in macOSBig Sur 11.0.1, watchOS 7.0, iOS 14.0 and iPadOS 14.0, iCloud for Windows7.21, tvOS 14.0. A remote attacker may be able to cause a denial ofservice.

criterions.comment: sqlite: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
